TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class EventInfo : System.Reflection.MemberInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo
.class public sequential ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EventInfo extends System.Reflection.MemberInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo
Public MustInherit Class EventInfo Inherits MemberInfo Implements _EventInfo
public ref class EventInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MemberInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_EventInfo
type EventInfo = class inherit MemberInfo interface _EventInfo

summary.span: 发现事件的属性并提供对事件元数据的访问权。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of an event and provides access to event metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来检查事件，并挂接事件处理程序中的代码示例所示方法。Use the class to inspect events and to hook up event handlers, as shown in the example code for the method. > [!NOTE] > 不是要用来引发事件。 is not intended to be used to raise events. 对象由其内部状态指示引发事件。An object raises events as dictated by its internal state. 事件与委托一起使用。Events are used with delegates. 事件侦听器实例化时引发的事件源调用的事件处理程序委托。An event listener instantiates an event-handler delegate that is invoked whenever the event is raised by an event source. 若要连接到事件源，事件侦听器将此委托添加到源上的调用列表。In order to connect to the event source, the event listener adds this delegate to the invocation list on the source. 当引发事件时，调用事件处理程序委托的 invoke 方法。When the event is raised, the invoke method of the event-handler delegate is called. 支持这两个多路广播和单路事件通知。Both multicast and single-cast event notifications are supported. `Add`和`Remove`必须在元数据中标记方法，以及与事件相关联的事件处理程序委托类。The `Add` and `Remove` methods, as well as the event-handler delegate class associated with an event, must be marked in the metadata. 委托是面向对象的函数指针。Delegates are object-oriented function pointers. 在 C 或 c + + 中，函数指针是一种方法对的引用。In C or C++, a function pointer is a reference to a method. 委托与 C 或 c + + 函数指针不同包含两个引用： 对方法，并对支持该方法的对象的引用的引用。In contrast to the C or C++ function pointer, a delegate contains two references: a reference to a method and a reference to an object that supports the method. 委托可以调用的方法，而不必知道类类型声明或继承的方法。Delegates can invoke a method without knowing the class type that declares or inherits the method. 委托只需知道该方法的返回类型和参数列表。Delegates need only know the return type and parameter list of the method. 事件模型同样适用于单强制转换和多路广播委托。The event model works equally well for single-cast and multicast delegates. 当调用委托的调用时调用方法时，只有单个对象可以对其进行调用的方法。When the delegate's invoke method is called, only a single object will have a method called on it. 多路广播的修饰符可以应用于委托声明，它允许多个方法时调用该委托的 invoke 方法调用。A multicast modifier can be applied to a delegate declaration, which allows multiple methods to be called when the invoke method of the delegate is called. 调用上`EventInfo`时`inherit`参数`GetCustomAttributes`是`true`不会遍历类型层次结构。Calling on `EventInfo` when the `inherit` parameter of `GetCustomAttributes` is `true` does not walk the type hierarchy. 使用继承的自定义特性。Use to inherit custom attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码获取对象事件的类。The following code gets an object for the event of the class. [!code-cpp[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CPP/type_getevent1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CS/type_getevent1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/VB/type_getevent1.vb#1)]

This type is thread safe.

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , and .

abstract member AddEventHandler : obj * Delegate -> unit override this.AddEventHandler : obj * Delegate -> unit

param.name: target
param.span: 事件源。

span.span: The event source.

param.name: handler
param.span: 封装目标引发事件时将调用的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method or methods to be invoked when the event is raised by the target.

summary.span: 将事件处理程序添加到事件源。

span.span: Adds an event handler to an event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试将添加要同步目标对象上的事件的委托。This method attempts to add a delegate to synchronize the event on the target object. 每次引发事件时由目标参数处理程序封装的方法的调用。Each time the event is raised by the target parameter, the method or methods encapsulated by the handler are invoked. 可以使用`AddEventHander`方法后已编译该程序，不能使用 + = 语法 C# 或 Visual Basic 时加载的类型时`WithEvents`和`Handles`挂接事件的关键字。You might use the `AddEventHander` method when you load a type after the program is already compiled, when it is not possible to use the C# += syntax or the Visual Basic `WithEvents` and `Handles` keywords to hook up the event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的实例类，创建事件处理程序使用动态程序集，并动态事件处理程序挂钩。The following example creates an instance of the class, creates an event handler using a dynamic assembly, and hooks up the dynamic event handler. 使用后期绑定执行所有操作。All actions are performed using late binding. 类型的变量中存储实例，并访问的所有代码会因此后期绑定。The instance is stored in a variable of type , and all code that accesses the does so late-bound. 该示例使用方法以获取事件，并属性获取事件的委托类型。The example uses the method to get the event, and the property to get the delegate type for the event. 此示例获取有关`Invoke`方法的委托类型，并获取从委托的签名实例。The example gets a for the `Invoke` method of the delegate type and obtains the signature of the delegate from the instance. 该示例然后使用一个模块，其中包含名为的单个类型创建动态程序集`Handler`，并提供类型`static`方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名为`DynamicHandler`处理事件。The example then creates a dynamic assembly with one module containing a single type named `Handler` and gives the type a `static` method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `DynamicHandler` that handles the event. 创建动态类型后，此示例获取完成方法并使用它来创建委托实例。After the dynamic type is created, the example gets a for the finished method and uses it to create a delegate instance. 此实例将传递给挂接事件的方法。This instance is passed to the method to hook up the event. 然后，程序暂停以允许引发事件。The program then pauses to allow the event to be raised. [!code-csharp[AddEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddEventHandler/cs/source.cs)] [!code-vb[AddEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddEventHandler/vb/source.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性，以发现事件的委托类型，并显示其参数类型。The following example uses the property to discover the delegate type of an event and to display its parameter types. 该示例定义名为的委托`MyDelegate`和名为的事件`ev`类型的`MyDelegate`。The example defines a delegate named `MyDelegate` and an event named `ev` of type `MyDelegate`. 中的代码`Main`方法通过获取该事件的委托类型来发现事件签名获取`Invoke`方法的委托类型，然后检索和显示的参数。The code in the `Main` method discovers the event signature by getting the delegate type of the event, getting the `Invoke` method of the delegate type, and then retrieving and displaying the parameters. [!code-cpp[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/CPP/eventarg.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/CS/eventarg.cs#1)] [!code-vb[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/VB/eventarg.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回在元数据中使用 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

span.span: Returns the public methods that have been associated with an event in metadata using the directive.

returns.span: 对象的数组，表示已在元数据中通过使用 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

span.span: An array of objects representing the public methods that have been associated with the event in metadata by using the directive.

returns.span: 如果没有此类公共方法，则返回空数组。

span.span: If there are no such public methods, an empty array is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的元数据可将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event: - `.addon`指令指定了用于添加事件处理程序的方法。The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers. 使用方法来检索为该方法。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.removeon`指令指定用来分离事件处理程序的方法。The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers. 使用方法来检索为该方法。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.fire`指令指定用来引发事件的方法。The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event. 使用方法来检索为该方法。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.other`指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event. 使用方法来检索其中的数组为这些方法的对象。Use the method to retrieve an array of objects for those methods. 与事件使用关联的方法`.other`指令具有向运行时没有特别的意义。The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime. C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器不要使用`.other`指令。The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的元数据可将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event: - `.addon`指令指定了用于添加事件处理程序的方法。The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers. 使用方法来检索为该方法。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.removeon`指令指定用来分离事件处理程序的方法。The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers. 使用方法来检索为此方法。Use the method to retrieve an for this method. - `.fire`指令指定用来引发事件的方法。The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event. 使用方法来检索为此方法。Use the method to retrieve an for this method. - `.other`指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event. 使用方法来检索其中的数组为这些方法的对象。Use the method to retrieve an array of objects for those methods. 与事件使用关联的方法`.other`指令具有向运行时没有特别的意义。The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime. C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器不要使用`.other`指令。The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 通常情况下，该方法具有以下签名：Typically, the method has the following signature: ``` remove_( handler) ```

summary.span: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 是否具有一个有特殊意义的名称。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a name with a special meaning.

value.span: 如果此事件具有一个特殊名称，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this event has a special name; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定事件的名称是否具有特殊含义。This property determines whether the event's name has a special meaning. 名称的开头或包含下划线字符 (_)、 属性访问器和运算符重载的方法是可能需要特殊处理某些编译器的名称的示例。Names that begin with or contain an underscore character (_), property accessors, and operator overloading methods are examples of names that might require special treatment by some compilers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代。This property overrides . 因此，检查一系列对象，例如，返回的数组—属性返回仅当给定的成员是一个事件。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property returns only when a given member is an event.

summary.span: 从事件源中移除事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes an event handler from an event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试删除可能会同步目标对象上的事件的委托。This method attempts to remove the delegate that may synchronize this event on the target object. 通过目标、 方法或通过封装的方法引发事件时`handler`将无法再调用。When an event is raised by target, the method or methods encapsulated by `handler` will no longer be invoked.

exception.span: 该事件没有公共的 访问器。

span.span: The event does not have a public accessor.

exception.span: 传入的处理程序无法使用。

span.span: The handler that was passed in cannot be used.
